metadata.name: Orbactiv 400 mg 1 Injection powder lyophilized for solution

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Intended for the treatment of various forms of cancer

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Phenoxodiol inhibits proliferation of many cancer cell lines and induces apoptosis by disrupting FLICE inhibitory protein FLIP expression and by caspase dependent and independent degradation of the X linked inhibitor of apoptosis XIAP In addition phenoxodiol sensitizes drug resistant tumour cells to anticancer drugs including paclitaxel carboplatin and gemcitabine
